🌌 Finora AI Analysis for $DOT  #DOTUSDT  | 1h  - The price is currently in a sideways structure just above the lowest point of the recent swing, with bullish signals from all indicators despite a generally bearish background. - I expect a possible move higher toward the 2.130 and 2.144 levels if price holds above 2.096 and does not close below 2.084; these are the first targets for any upward reaction and likely areas for short-term sellers to step in. - If price fails at these resistances and forms reversal candles or clear rejection, watch for a drop back into the 2.096 and 2.084 demand region, and if that doesn’t hold, a sweep of the 2.048 recent swing low is likely. - For a long setup, wait for a clear bullish engulfing, pin bar, or strong reversal on a lower timeframe after a sweep or quick dip below 2.084 or 2.048. Enter only if there is a fast recovery back above these zones targeting 2.130 and 2.144. - For a short setup, look for a clear rejection above 2.130 or 2.144 with a sharp reversal candle or...  📊 Get detailed free analysis of any coin on any timeframe you want.
